attributes.action: Make sanitry towels & nappies availible FREE on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The title says it all really. Every woman needs sanitry towels & every Mother will use both.  You hand out condoms the Contrceptive pill. Not every one uses these things. Every woman would benefit from sanitry towels. If they choose not to use the brand you provide then they can choose to pay for their own sanitry towels or nappies but at least there will be something availible for them to make a choice.
